original_title: Woman dies after wall collapses at house, two including infant injured
original_body_lines: A woman has died while her husband and daughter have been injured and hospitalized after a wall in their house had collapsed at Minneriya in Hingurakgoda.
Police said that a wall had collapsed in their home following the heavy downpour in the area.
Accordingly, a 23-year-old woman had died in the incident whole her husband and one-year-old daughter have been admitted to the Polonnaruwa Hospital with injuries.
